Founded in 2011, GestionDBI is a new provider into seedbox and VPS Hosting. We were before know on the name of NetworkChannel.info and TheMineator.com were those service is specialise into webhosting/IT consulting and game server. Our mission is to provide virtualization solutions at highly competitive price. We offer multitude of hosting services like web hosting, game server hosting and of course, VPS hosting.
